channel.title: Portforwarding?
channel.description: I think i portforwarded correctly, but when i try to log into my server it says it can not connect. Can your run a private server from a laptop and be able to portforward or do i have to use utorrent? Help me out! Thanks.

item.title: Portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @Michaeliii Michaeliii
item.description:
@Michaeliii wrote:

JGX solved my problem, he is some good help. Ask him if you need anything. I can now run my own server.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Hm, download TeamViewer.

Message me your TV id and password.
I think I can assist you with your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @Michaeliii Michaeliii
item.description:
@Michaeliii wrote:

[quote=“JGX, post:2, topic:431264”]Yes you can run a RSPS off of a laptop, I’m currently doing it now.

Now, either you didn’t forward the ports correctly
or,
You haven’t edited the your servers IP into the client files.[/quote]

i did both im pretty sure, i know for a fact that i put the server ip into the client files. and i ithink i ported correctly. So idk.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding?

or,
